Text:
dear downloaders,

there is a problem. I cant keep seeding 24/7 .... there is power cut problems in this part of the world.

But whenever I can I'll seed. So If you are downloading... and suddenly it stops...plz don't be disappointed. I'll start seeding asap after some time. So be back.
Interesting, if somewhat random, collection. I'll give it a try, thanks!

OK...

3 Days now without any seeding. I do appriciate the effort, but in the end it's like this:

IF YOU CAN'T SEED, DON'T UPLOAD ANY TORRENTS!!!

No matter what the reason, you obviously can't seed your torrent. It's extremely frustrating to wait days or even weeks before a relatively small torrent is completed. You are better off letting someone else seed for you.

I'm sorry, but I have to agree with Deznaj here. There's a huge bunch of peers stuck at 41.4% for days now, which is ridiculous. I guess it's time to dump this torrent and forget about the time wasted on it. Thanks, but no thanks.
